name: World of Solitaire: Classic card game
name_original: World of Solitaire: Classic card game
description:
The Card Games you used to play in your Windows PC, Klondike Solitaire.
Enjoy Classy Klondike Solitaire with World of Solitaire: Klondike!

Lots of FUN! World of Solitaire: Klondike
- Challenging FUN: 6,000 Klondike Solitaire Stages
- New FUN: Collect Stars and open new Klondike Solitaire Chapters
- Collecting FUN: Collect Klondike Solitaire Trophies with Daily Challenges
- Decorating FUN: Set up themes, with any taste you want!

Kick the Boredom OUT! World of Solitaire: Klondike
- Waiting for the Bus? Klondike Solitaire!
- 30 minutes before bed? Klondike Solitaire!
- In a long hour flight? Klondike Solitaire!

Wherever, Whenever! World of Solitaire: Klondike
- Play Klondike Solitaire anywhere you want with no wi-fi mode
- A single finger is all you need in easy Klondike Solitaire
- Klondike Solitaire offers left-hand mode for left-handers

World of Solitaire: Klondike Customer Service - solitaire@help.neowiz.com

---
